languages.text: "Свет... овладевает мной. Он уже везде вокруг! Везде..." {n}Женщина поворачивает к вам голову и выпаливает — неожиданно низким и хриплым голосом.{/n} "Спаси меня! Даруй Покой Императора! Пожалуйста!"

"The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"
languages.original_text: "Свет... овладевает мной. Он уже везде вокруг! Везде..." {n}Женщина поворачивает к вам голову и выпаливает — неожиданно низким и хриплым голосом.{/n} "Спаси меня! Даруй Покой Императора! Пожалуйста!"

traits.locale_text: "The light... Is taking me over. It is everywhere around here already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head towards you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruffy voice.{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Rest! Please!"

"The light... Is taking me over. It is everywhere around here already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head towards you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruffy voice.{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Rest! Please!"

"The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"

"The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"

"The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"

languages.text: “那道光……正在吞噬我。它已经无处不在了！无处不在……”{n}女人把头转向你，继续开了口。她的声音既低沉、又嘶哑，让你吃了一惊。{/n}“救救我吧！赐予我帝皇安息吧！求求你了！”
languages.original_text: "The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"

traits.locale_text: “那道光……正在吞噬我。它已经无处不在了！无处不在……”{n}女人把头转向你，继续开了口。她的声音既低沉、又嘶哑，让你吃了一惊。{/n}“救救我吧！赐予我帝皇安息吧！求求你了！”

languages.text: «La luz... se apodera de mí. ¡Ya está por todas partes! Por todas...». {n}La mujer se gira hacia ti y con voz sorprendentemente grave y ronca, exclama:{/n} «¡Sálveme! ¡Deme la Paz del Emperador, por favor!».
languages.original_text: "The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"

traits.locale_text: «La luz... se apodera de mí. ¡Ya está por todas partes! Por todas...». {n}La mujer se gira hacia ti y con voz sorprendentemente grave y ronca, exclama:{/n} «¡Sálveme! ¡Deme la Paz del Emperador, por favor!».

languages.text: 「光に…奪われる。もうそこら中に！あっちにも、こっちにも…」{n}女はこちらに顔を向けて、意外と低くしわがれた声で口走る。{/n}「助けて！どうか、皇帝陛下の安らぎを！お願い！」
languages.original_text: "The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"

traits.locale_text: 「光に…奪われる。もうそこら中に！あっちにも、こっちにも…」{n}女はこちらに顔を向けて、意外と低くしわがれた声で口走る。{/n}「助けて！どうか、皇帝陛下の安らぎを！お願い！」

languages.text: "Das Licht ... übernimmt mich. Es ist schon überall! Überall ..." {n}Die Frau dreht dir den Kopf zu und sagt dann plötzlich mit einer unfassbar tiefen und rauen Stimme:{/n} "Rettet mich! Gewährt mir den Frieden des Imperators! Bitte!"
languages.original_text: "The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"

traits.locale_text: "Das Licht ... übernimmt mich. Es ist schon überall! Überall ..." {n}Die Frau dreht dir den Kopf zu und sagt dann plötzlich mit einer unfassbar tiefen und rauen Stimme:{/n} "Rettet mich! Gewährt mir den Frieden des Imperators! Bitte!"

languages.text: « La lumière... m'envahit. Elle est déjà partout ! Partout... » {n}La femme se tourne à nouveau vers vous et, d'une voix beaucoup plus forte et rauque, vous supplie :{/n} « Sauvez-moi ! Accordez-moi la paix de l'Empereur ! Pitié ! »
languages.original_text: "The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"

traits.locale_text: « La lumière... m'envahit. Elle est déjà partout ! Partout... » {n}La femme se tourne à nouveau vers vous et, d'une voix beaucoup plus forte et rauque, vous supplie :{/n} « Sauvez-moi ! Accordez-moi la paix de l'Empereur ! Pitié ! »

languages.text: "Işık... Beni ele geçiriyor. Her yerde! Her yerde..." {n}Kadın, kafasını sana doğru çevirip beklenmedik bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor. Sesi oldukça boğuk, âdeta hırıltıyı andırıyor.{/n} "Kurtarın beni! İmparator'un Huzuru'nu bahşedin! Yalvarırım!"
languages.original_text: "The light... is taking me over. It's everywhere already! Everywhere..." {n}The woman turns her head toward you and blurts out in an unexpectedly low and gruff voice,{/n} "Save me! Give me the Emperor's Peace! Please!"

traits.locale_text: "Işık… Beni ele geçiriyor. Her yerde! Her yerde…" {n}Kadın, kafasını sana doğru çevirip beklenmedik bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor. Sesi oldukça boğuk ve hırlamayı andırıyor.{/n} "Kurtarın beni! Bana İmparator'un Huzuru'nu bahşedin! Yalvarırım!"
